text: @GovAndyBeshear Gov.Beshear, just want to say thank you for doing what you're doing. We're in our early 70's raising our 2 great-granddaughters. ( 5 and 12) and between the CoronaVirus and the new child illness goingaround we are thankful you're leading our state. I have an autoimmune illness
